doc:
Jere Burns https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jere_Burns 0 Jere Eugene Burns II (born October 15, 1954) is an American actor who has appeared in theatre productions and on television. He played the roles of ladies' man Kirk Morris on the television series Dear John, DIA psychiatrist Anson Fullerton on the television series Burn Notice, and Dixie Mafia middle-man Wynn Duffy on Justified. Jere_Eugene_Burns_II ( born October_15_,_1954 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in theatre_productions and on television . He played the_roles of ladies '_man_Kirk_Morris on the_television_series_Dear_John , DIA_psychiatrist_Anson_Fullerton on the_television_series_Burn_Notice , and Dixie_Mafia_middle-man_Wynn_Duffy on Justified .
